alert.note: Alert for Copper River Basin (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 3:45PM AKST until December 27 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow and Freezing rain expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches, with localized amounts up to 11 inches near the Alaska Range. Ice accumulations of a trace to one tenth of an inch, mainly along the Glenn Highway from Chickaloon to Tahneta Pass. * WHERE...Copper River Basin. * WHEN...Until midnight AKST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel may be difficult. Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is expected near the Alaska Range as well as along the Tok Cutoff, including Paxson and Chistochina up to Mentasta Lake. Freezing rain along the Glenn Highway from Chickaloon to Tahneta Pass may become heavier at times. Precipitation will transition back to mostly snow overnight tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
